page.title: 06LIVING IN GROBY.
page.content: Groby is a pleasant place to live in,with plenty of friendly people surrounding you.When I first came to Groby I was very nervous but everybody made me very welcome.I gradually made friends with helpful people showing me round the village.You can always find something to do in Groby,for instance a walk in Martinshaw Wood that we are now fighting to keep,I don't think Groby would be the same without it. You don't have to walk far to the shops and those in the centre of the village include a newsagent,jeweller, greengrocers,chemist,bank,small supermarket,bank,building society and post office. People come from miles around to visit Groby Pool and Bradgate Park both well known beauty spots.There is also a Pick-Your-Own farm where you can get fresh fruit and vegetables.
